price: Isaan kafaranii keeyyattoota keenyas sobsiisan, isaan warra ibiddaati.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
